awardList.award_info: The front end chatted early and shared "How to conceive and develop an out-of-the-box visual chart library G2Plot"

workExpList.work_desc: Front end intern. Use React to participate in the development of various products: data research and development platform, data decision-making platform, data analysis platform research and development, and also participate in the reconstruction of large-scale BI products, and have good coding habits.
Front-end intern. Use Vue to implement platform functions and logic, and then use ECharts to display the visual results of data mining analysis

skillList.skill_desc: Rich visualization engineering practice and open source experience
Large-scale front-end project experience and component library development experience

projectList.project_desc: DeepInsight is a self-service BI data insight analysis platform independently developed by Ant Group. It is aimed at enterprise analysts, business personnel and developers, and helps Ant Group achieve refined operations.
projectList.project_content:
The core part of the BI platform tool is report production, which is the process of forming chart materials through data connection and visual configuration, then page layout by dragging and dropping, and finally forming a report page for publishing. 
1. Lead the construction of open capabilities, pull through products, design and build, and expand visual graphics to enhance the richness
2. Optimize product experience, especially to overcome the stubborn experience of ECharts
3. Lead the construction of visualization capabilities: business standardized chart library Construction (with rich experience in general component design and development), promotion of visual integration construction such as enhancement of data analysis capabilities

projectList.project_desc: G2 is a visual rendering engine based on the theory of graphics grammar, and G2Plot is an out-of-the-box statistical visualization chart library packaged on the basis of G2
projectList.project_content: AntV visualization construction empowers the entire Ant and Ali Group"s statistical visualization analysis related businesses. Responsible for the research and development of AntV series: AntV official website, G rendering engine, G2, G2Plot, ThemeSet theme builder and other open source projects.

aboutme.aboutme_desc:
🌱 Focus on data visualization and analysis 😈 Ability items: communication and coordination ability, executive ability
    Participate in the research and development of the AntV team's open source projects G2 and G2Plot, and is currently the main person in charge of G2Plot.
